text: Magglio Jose "Maggs" Ordóñez (born January 28, 1974) is a former Major League Baseball player from Venezuela. He was a right fielder and right-handed batter. Ordóñez was born in Coro, Venezuela. He played for the Chicago White Sox from 1997 to 2004 and the Detroit Tigers from 2005 to 2011. After his baseball career, Ordóñez became a mayor in Venezuela. == Other websites == , or Retrosheet *Pura Pelota – Venezuelan Professional League statistics Category:1974 births Category:American League All-Stars Category:Chicago White Sox players Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Caracas Category:Venezuelan baseball players
title: Magglio Ordóñez
